headline: What Recent Developments Mean For The Evolving Tapestry Investment Story
summary: Tapestry's updated narrative comes with only a slight trim to its fair value estimate to about $121.44 per share and a marginally lower discount rate of roughly 9.08 %, signaling a still constructive long term view. Revenue growth expectations have been nudged down to around 3.21 % annually as analysts balance strong brand momentum with tougher comparisons and macro uncertainty. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these evolving assumptions as the story continues to develop. Analyst...

headline: Jim Cramer Says He Likes “What’s Happening in Tapestry Under Joanne Crevoiserat”
summary: Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE:TPR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed, along with the tech battleground. Cramer mentioned the stock during the episode and said: “I love turnaround stories. If you catch a turnaround early, you can make big, long-term money, and that’s especially true in retail, where comebacks are very hard to find. But […]
